text: The Zand dynasty (Persian: سلسله زندیه), was an Iranian dynasty founded by Karim Khan () who ruled all Iran excluding Khorasan of Zand clan of Kurd tribe Lak tribe. == Rulers of Iran == * Karim Khan Zand, 1751–1779 * Mohammad Ali Khan Zand, 1779 * Abol-Fath Khan Zand, 1779 * Sadeq Khan Zand, 1779–1782 * Ali-Morad Khan Zand, 1782–1785 * Jafar Khan, 1785–1789 * Sayed Morad Khan, 1789 * Lotf Ali Khan, 1789–1794 == References == == Sources == * * * Category:History of Iran Category:1751 establishments Category:Former countries in the Middle East
title: Zand dynasty
